meanings.definition: A poem or song about lovers parting at dawn.
meanings.sent1: The aubade filled the air with bittersweet melodies as the lovers said goodbye at sunrise.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a beautiful aubade to capture the moment of parting between the two lovers at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The aubade was so emotional that it made everyone at the party shed a tear.
meanings.sent4: The aubade echoed through the empty streets, a haunting reminder of the lovers' farewell at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The aubade painted a vivid picture of the sunrise, symbolizing the end of their time together.

meanings.definition: A morning love song or poem.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, he would sing a sweet aubade to his beloved to start her day with joy.
meanings.sent2: The aubade he composed was filled with love and tenderness, expressing his feelings for her at sunrise.
meanings.sent3: His aubade was so romantic that it made her blush every time he recited it.
meanings.sent4: The aubade was like a gentle hug from the sun, warming her heart with love each morning.
meanings.sent5: The aubade was a reminder of their love, a melody that danced in the morning light.

meanings.definition: A piece of music appropriate to the dawn or early morning.
meanings.sent1: The aubade played by the orchestra was a perfect start to the day, filling the room with peaceful melodies.
meanings.sent2: As the sun rose, the aubade serenaded the world with its soothing tunes, bringing a sense of calm to all who listened.
meanings.sent3: The aubade was so uplifting that it made everyone feel energized and ready to face the day ahead.
meanings.sent4: Listening to the aubade was like watching the sunrise, a beautiful and harmonious experience.
meanings.sent5: The aubade was a musical embrace of the morning, wrapping everyone in its gentle notes.
